snippet.title: Fantasy Warlord - iOS / Android - HD Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Fantasy Warlord by GAMEVIL Inc. (iOS / Android)

The ultimate mobile fantasy RPG!
Collect powerful Guardians and build alliances to raid the World Boss!

■ COLLECT ■
- Extract and collect the souls of legendary Guardians!
- Discover all 4 types of Guardians - Human, Demon, God, and Gaia!

■ COMBINE ■
- Combine your Guardians to create an even more powerful one!
- The combinations are endless!

■ BATTLE ■
- Assemble your Guardians and battle the World Boss to climb up the rankings!
- Battle against other players around the world in Global PvP!

■ SOCIALIZE ■
- Build alliances with other players worldwide through the global chat!
- Avenge fallen allies and collect lucrative bounties!

Join the community at https://www.facebook.com/PlayFantasyWarlord

NEWS & EVENTS
Website http://www.gamevil.com
Facebook http://facebook.com/gamevil
Twitter http://twitter.com/gamevil
YouTube http://youtube.com/gamevil

Terms of Service: http://bit.ly/termsgamevil
Privacy Policy: http://bit.ly/privacygamevil

iTunes Store Page:

https://itunes.apple.com/nz/app/fantasy-warlord/id844684912?mt=8

Google Play:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gamevil.fantasywarlord.ad.google.ww.normal
